transcript: he says that sometimes as i'm um reciting the fatih i may pause in the middle to repeat a word or vicar subhana rabbil aveem and he continues so is this invalid does this invalidate my salat because it changes the meaning the answer is no again if you're doing this unwillingly or due to a loss of breath or due to wanting to repeat the word again this has no impact on your prayer
